html:
Oct 29 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Capgemini, SSE and United Utilities, on Friday.


HIGHLIGHTS


* BASF SE BASFn.DE: CFRA raises to strong buy from buy

* Capgemini CAPP.PA: JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 230 from EUR 210

* Korian SA KORI.PA: Portzamparc raises Recommandation to "buy" from "accumulate"

* SSE SSE.L: JP Morgan raises target price to 1,600p from 1,550p

* United Utilities UU.L: HSBC raises to hold from reduce
